analysis.key_quote: This proposal threatens the merit-based civil service system that has underpinned the nonpartisan federal workforce for over a century and threatens to reclassify many positions that should not be held by political appointees.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the Schedule F proposal, highlighting concerns about its impact on the merit-based civil service system and due process protections for federal employees. It emphasizes the risks of politicization and undermining the integrity of the federal workforce.
